long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you feel the pain of manually collecting email addresses, then what? Install the email scraper Chrome extension, that will scan any website you visit and instantly collect all the email addresses it finds. Moreover, it would also put additional information into each email, namely the sender's name and the exact webpage where you obtained the email. This can be important when building your contact list.  

Additionally, this extension will give you the chance to download all the extracted emails in a convenient form for simple use. 

Key features of Email Scraper chrome extension 

Instant Email Collection: It automatically searches over the websites for email addresses. 

Sender Details: Allows the sender’s name as well as email to be specified 

Webpage Origin: Determines the exact page that the email was located on. 

Convenient Download: You can easily download them all which makes their use easier. 

How to Use 

 1. Install the Extension 

Go on to the Chrome Web Store and search for the "Email Scraper chrome" extension. 

Click on the "Add to Chrome" button and then click "Add extension" from the resulting pop-up. 

2. Activate the Extension 

After installing, click on the icon of extension in the toolbar of the Chrome. 

Tap the on-screen button to turn on the email scraping functionality. 

3. Browse Websites 

Browse to any website that you would like to extract emails from. 

The extension will initiate the search for email addresses on the webpage, sender details and the webpage origin. 

4. Download Extracted Emails 

Hit the extension icon once again to open the interface. 

Check the list of emails addresses and additional information collected. 

Click the "Download" button to save the recovered emails in a CSV format that is useful for future applications. 

Why is it Useful? 

The Email Scraper extension is designed to automatically scrape email addresses from websites, increasing speed and reducing the risk of errors. Furthermore, it records emails and captures the sender's name and the exact website source, making your contact list much more organized and neater. The access to this information in an easy-to-download form helps speed up tasks such as marketing, outreach, and research, which increases productivity. 

Who is the intended audience? 

The Email Scraper extension is a tool which is perfectly suited for professionals in marketing, sales, research, and business development. Marketing can be used to create mailing lists for email campaigns, while sales teams can easily obtain leads' contact information. People can collect data quickly, and businesses can grow their contacts and possibly find new clients. Any individual who needs to be in touch with emails for office work will be able to leverage the tool's automated features. 

FAQs  

1. How do I install the Email Scraper extension? 

The installation of the Email Scraper extension might be done by visiting the Chrome Web Store, searching for "Email Scraper," clicking "Add to Chrome," and confirming by clicking "Add extension" on the displayed pop-up. 

 2. Does the extension work on all websites? 

The extension is mostly compatible with most sites on the web; however, the working efficiency can be influenced by the site’s structure and the settings of the site security. It is created to operate with the HTML content emails and to scan and gather them. 

3. Can I customize the information collected with each email? 

Indeed, an extension can gather the sender's name, the webpage origin with each email address via a single click. Nevertheless, a user could have a limited choice of customizing these default settings. 

4. How do I download the collected emails? 

Afterwards, the extension will need to be opened by clicking on the extension icon, which will then present an interface. Then you can go to the emails page, pick them out and click "Download" to save them in a convenient way. 

 5. Is the Email Scraper extension secure to use? 

It is designed to operate with the user safety in mind. Nevertheless, be careful where you download your extensions from and always beware of the data you collect and use, adhering to the relevant privacy regulations.
